For character reference here are the specs for the Iron Fist
 The The Iron Fist:
 
 
 Ship Name: Iron Fist
 Crew Number: 1,200( mostly ship automated drones that operate the 
ship)
 Armaments: 8  massive Plasma rifles in four twin turrets, multiple 
smaller turrets armed with laser cannons. Multiple hull mounted 
retractable missile arrays 
  Cabilites: The Iron Fist is one and half times larger then the 
Decepticon warship Nemisis, the ship that inspired her creation. Her 
apperance is similar to the nemisis in the lower hull,( this section 
is completely sumberged when the ship is in the water) but mid way up 
her appearance is radicly different. to save on description picture 
the WW2 battleship BISMARK and the Nemisis togther thats what you got.

  The ship is a wonder of Predicon technology, she can enter and 
leave a planet's atmosphere but can not fly like the Nemsis was 
capable of. She can however sail any water she is in like a normal 
ship. To enter the atmosphere she uses energy shields but to leave 
she must rely on her massive engines to thrust her free.

  The ship's weapons are formidable, but have weaknesses. Desgined 
for ship to ship combat her main armament has difficulty being used 
to bombard pin point targets ona planet's surface. Her central fire 
control located atop the bridge tower is acurate but cant aim the 
smaller batteries which have thier own targeting scanners. None of 
these systems can work togther as one super smart system.

  The ship's drone crew are not intelleigent and must remain at most 
with in a line of sight of the ship to operate. They all use a 
central computer on the ship to function and think. Lose the signal 
they go off line.

  Strengths: The ship is at home in the water as much as she is in 
space. While the drones can't operate very far from the ship, she 
does carry probes and small scout ships that can roam the planet and 
the solar system. 

  Her armor plating is thick and most land based weapons will not 
pierce it. Her targeting systems work well by themselves and are 
acurate when working right. Her transwarp engines are 100% 
functional, but like all cybertrionian ships her parts are 
interchangeable with maximal componets.

 Note: Finer details of the ship will become evident throu game play.


-Game Play-

  The Iron Fist's arrival to prehistory earth was less the subtle. A 
fiery streak across the sky, that rapidly dissappated as the ship 
slowed. Passing over the European contient the ship set down in the 
cool waters of the English coast.

  "Reentry complete, water mode online," the drone reported.

  "Good, launch the probes lets confirm what our planetary scans 
showed," Major Panzertron ordered," Also find out where that Maximal 
ship landed, she cost us one of our scout ships."

  Panzertron waited for the probes to depart and begin scanning.
  He then tapped the computer display and  a holo image appered 
before him.
    "Probes confirm, high levels of energon detected. Operational 
Maximal and Predicon energy singatures exceddes mission expectations."

  "No one knew for sure how many had made it to this time frame," 
Panzertron said to himself,"Scan for compaitable beast forms and 
replicate for the crew."

 "Yes sir," the drones replied.

 "And hail any transformers in the area," Panzertron said," Let them 
know where are here."
